name: sonet
description: Sonet Social Media Platform - Enterprise-Grade Twitter Alternative

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:services"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:gateway && npm run build:services
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:gateway && npm run test:services
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:docker
scripts.clean:build: find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'build' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
scripts.clean:docker: cd sonet && docker-compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd sonet-client && npm install && cd ../gateway && npm install
scripts.update:all: npm update && cd sonet-client && npm update && cd ../gateway && npm update
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:gateway
scripts.format: npm run format:client && npm run format:gateway
scripts.start:production: npm run build && npm run docker:up && cd gateway && npm start
scripts.logs: npm run logs:gateway && npm run logs:services

author: Neo Qiss
